eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 08:46 PM ON NOV 28, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:46 AM NOV 29, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Pinal County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Pinal County Sheriff is looking for Keith Perkins last seen 11/28/20205 at 10 A.M. driving a blue Chevy Silverado pick up RXA5NH on Interstate 8. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
